comment: Commutation law for identical variable specifiers. Both sides of the biconditional are true when ` x ` and ` y ` are substituted with the same variable. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1993.) Change to a biconditional. (Revised by BJ, 26-Sep-2019.)
